AllowAdditionalInvoicing.description: Indicates if additional invoice is allowed for project

AllowMemberEntryOnly.description: Allow only member to create time or cost entry

BudgetedAmount.description: Budgeted amount of sales in the default currency of the company

BudgetedCosts.description: Budgeted amount of costs in the default currency of the company

BudgetedRevenue.description: Budgeted amount of revenue in the default currency of the company

Classification.description: Used only for PSA to link a project classification to the project

CostsAmountFC.description: Used only for PSA to store the budgetted costs of a project (except for project type Campaign and Non-billable). Positive quantities only

CustomerPOnumber.description: Used only for PSA to store the customer's PO number

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

EndDate.description: End date of the project. In combination with the start date the status is determined

FixedPriceItem.description: Item used for fixed price invoicing. To be defined per project. If empty the functionality relies on the setting

HasWBSLines.description: Indicates if whether the Project has WBS

IncludeInvoiceSpecification.description: Include invoice specification. E.g: 1 = Based on account, 2 = Always, 3 = Never

IncludeSpecificationInInvoicePdf.description: Indicates whether to include invoice specification in invoice PDF

InternalNotes.description: Internal notes not to be printed in invoice

InvoiceAsQuoted.description: Indicates whether the project is invoice as quoted

PrepaidItem.description: Used only for PSA. This item is used for prepaid invoicing. If left empty, the functionality relies on a setting

SalesTimeQuantity.description: Budgeted time. Total number of hours estimated for the fixed price project

StartDate.description: Start date of a project. In combination with the end date the status is determined

Type.description: Reference to ProjectTypes. E.g: 1 = Campaign , 2 = Fixed Price, 3 = Time and Material, 4 = Non billable, 5 = Prepaid

UseBillingMilestones.description: Indicates whether the Project is using billing milestones
